title: Can the wiki get access to the API?

comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body:
I already did so over here: https://github.com/codemasher/gw2-database/commit/44dffaded5e543a997db9e9185631eb157acb206#diff-39b57f3d58b93c50a34158b6d2d24065L1
(but only for the german and a little of the french wikis)
Since the wikicode is a mess and the templates are different in each wiki, i resigned…

comments.author: Elrey.5472
comments.body:
Topic.

Speaking of the spanish wiki, It would be great if we are able to create templates for the wiki and that template tracks down an item and adds all the information about it.

I’m not sure yet what approach to take on that yet, so any feedback or suggestions are as well wellcome.
